items.title: As India bans real-money games, Dream Sports, MPL start pulling the plug
items.description: Several Indian startups, including Dream Sports, MPL, and Zupee, are shutting down their real-money games after parliament passed a bill banning such ...

items.title: Ecosia has offered to take ‘stewardship’ of Chrome. And it’s not a bad idea.
items.description: Berlin-based nonprofit search engine Ecosia has asked a U.S. judge to turn Chrome into a foundation it controls, funding billions in climate projects.

items.title: Gas power plants approved for Meta’s $10B data center, and not everyone is happy
items.description: Meta's massive data center will draw power from three gas-fired power plants producing 2.25 gigawatts.

items.title: Elon Musk’s X may finally settle $500M severance lawsuit
items.description: Elon Musk's X is settling a severance lawsuit with former Twitter employees.
